page.title: 12Bodenham Manor School
page.content: Bodenham Manor School is situated on the side of Dinmore Hill overlooking the gravel pits at the edge of the village. The school is a residential school owned by the Bodenham Manor Charities Trust. The 5 buildings at the school together with the grounds cover approx. 22 acres. 49 People live on the premises and 26 work there.Some of those who live at the school may also work there. Mr David Hughes the Headmaster and his staff aim to help boys who have learning difficulties and who are less fortunate than others in many ways. The facilities are not used by anyone apart from those who live or work there.
